name: Prepare for Launch
summary: Get a Metamask wallet, create private/public keys, add Polygon Network, connect your wallet
description: Get a Metamask wallet, create private/public keys, add Polygon Network, connect your wallet

requirements.name: connect to the Ody game webpage.
requirements.description: connect to the Ody game webpage.

name: Fuel for Launch
summary: Join OdysseyDAO Discord server/ game channel. Introduce yourself. Provide ETH public address. We need to put fuel tokens (200 $FUEL  and some $MATIC tokens to cover gas fee) in your wallet.
description: Join OdysseyDAO Discord server/ game channel. Introduce yourself. Provide ETH public address. We need to put fuel tokens (200 $FUEL  and some $MATIC tokens to cover gas fee) in your wallet.

requirements.name: Join Discord server. Send Ody your public address
requirements.description: Join Discord server. Send Ody your public address

requirements.name: Wait for airdrop to be completed
requirements.description: Wait for airdrop to be completed

name: Life Support
summary: Get some air ($AIR) to your crew. Go to Uniswap (https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?chain=polygon)  and swap 50 $FUEL tokens for the some $AIR tokens.
description: Get some air ($AIR) to your crew. Go to Uniswap (https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?chain=polygon)  and swap 50 $FUEL tokens for the some $AIR tokens.

requirements.name: Go to Uniswap (https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?chain=polygon) and swap 50 $FUEL tokens for the same $AIR tokens.
requirements.description: Go to Uniswap (https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?chain=polygon) and swap 50 $FUEL tokens for the same $AIR tokens.

name: Blast off
summary: Enter your launch code (tokenID) and mint your unique Launch authorization NFT!
description: Enter your launch code (tokenID) and mint your unique Launch authorization NFT!

requirements.name: Enter your launch code (color code) in contract
requirements.description: Enter your launch code (color code) in contract

requirements.name: Mint Unique Launch Authorization NFT (launch button or 'Cleared for Launch') via contract through Polygonscan interaction
requirements.description: Mint Unique Launch Authorization NFT (launch button or 'Cleared for Launch') via contract through Polygonscan interaction

name: Emergency Situation
summary: A fellow crew member needs some $AIR. Please send 1 $AIR token to someone
description: A fellow crew member needs some $AIR. Please send 1 $AIR token to someone

requirements.name: Send only one $AIR token to someone.
requirements.description: Send only one $AIR token to someone.

name: LFG
summary:
Your rocket is off course.
We need to fix it and correct the trajectory. Please burn one $FUEL token by sending it to the burn address (0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dead)
description:
Your rocket is off course.
We need to fix it and correct the trajectory. Please burn one $FUEL token by sending it to the burn address (0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dead)

requirements.name: Burn one $FUEL token by sending it to the burn address (0x00…00)
requirements.description: Burn one $FUEL token by sending it to the burn address (0x00…00)

name: What do we do?
summary:
We're still off course - but there's hope
You’ve got just enough fuel to either get to one or another planet. Please vote to choose Planet for landing. You need at least 100 $FUEL tokens to vote.
This is a link of voting smart contract

name: Landing
summary: The crew decides to continue the mission. When you land, you create a new token to be used for trade. Send your captains and crewmates one of your newly minted tokens through Metamask (smart contract deployment - ERC-20 token)
